resources.string: L U V O F F E R
L U V O F F E R
Wrapping Paper Free with All Cards Brought

Wrap your gift for any occasion with this flat wrap paper. This high quality flat wrap paper features the large colourful print on a wide range of backgrounds, making this the perfect finishing touch for your gift.

All hail a British classic! our tasty Sausage Rolls have developed a bit of a following over the years. And it\'s easy to see why.\nFreshly baked in our shops throughout the day, these family favourites are made from seasoned sausage meat wrapped in layers of crisp, golden puff pastry.

Buy a Coffee Get a Free Muffin

Velvet flat white Coffee.
This one is the barista's pride and joy. It's rich, full flavoured coffee with a velvet smooth texture that's finished with the perfect florette.

Buy any of our range of coffees and get a chocalate Chip Muffin for free
Make sure that your location settings are turned on so that Luvoffer can recognize where you are and where the closest participating retailer is.
Simply choose the ones you want offers from. Once you see what you like click on the offer. Then click \'Get Offer\'

Ask the cashier to kindly activate your offers, then this will prohibit you from using this offer for a period of 24 hours. Not to worry your next offer is waiting for you around the corner. Literally. The opportunities are endless.

This underwear from our B by Ted Baker range will brighten up a lingerie wardrobe. Finished with an eye-catching 'Hanging Gardens' pattern, it flatters with lace detail and a logo pendant.
 - Main: 60% polyamide, 27% polyester, 13% elastane
 - Cup liner: 100% cotton
 - Machine washable
50% off Menswear for the Next Hour

Whether you\'re looking for a new outfit, on trend tailoring or everyday essentials, browse these up-to-the-minute men\'s clothing collections. Mix and match the latest men\'s fashion pieces with your favourite statement styles from Next.
Lovely refreshing summer fruit salad with coconuts-add a bit of fun and complemented the fruit. With a selection of fresh melons and a big tub means you get plenty for your money.
Two 100% beef patties with lettuce, onions, pickles, cheese and our unbeatable Big Mac sauce - all in a sesame seed bun.
